channel.title: Dicing guide tutorial HELP PLEASE
channel.description:
[code]src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:37: error: package Server does not exist if(c.clanId >= 0 && Server.clanChat.clans[c.clanId].owner.equalsIgnoreCase(c.pla yerName) && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 5000) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:42: error: package Server does not exist Server.clanChat.messageToClan("" + c.playerName + " rolled a "+ Diceamount2 +" o n the amount dice.", c.clanId); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:51: error: package Server does not exist if(c.clanId >= 0 && Server.clanChat.clans[c.clanId].owner.equalsIgnoreCase(c.pla yerName) && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 5000) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:56: error: package Server does not exist Server.clanChat.messageToClan("" + c.playerName + " rolled a "+ Diceamount1 +" o n the amount dice.", c.clanId); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:65: error: package Server does not exist if(c.clanId >= 0 && Server.clanChat.clans[c.clanId].owner.equalsIgnoreCase(c.pla yerName) && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 5000) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:70: error: package Server does not exist Server.clanChat.messageToClan("" + c.playerName + " rolled a "+ DiceamountB +" o n the amount dice.", c.clanId); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:79: error: package Server does not exist if(c.clanId >= 0 && Server.clanChat.clans[c.clanId].owner.equalsIgnoreCase(c.pla yerName) && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 5000) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:84: error: package Server does not exist Server.clanChat.messageToClan("" + c.playerName + " rolled a "+ Diceamount3 +" o n the amount dice.", c.clanId); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 8 errors A folytatáshoz nyomjon meg egy billentyűt . . .[/code]
Okay, so i have followed [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,508501.0.html]this[/url] tutorial. And I have managed to make the private dicing work. But i get those errors when I add the code to itemClick2.java. Help?

item.title: Dicing guide tutorial HELP PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @harusakura1 harusakura1
item.description:
@harusakura1 wrote:

src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:37: error: package Server does not exist if(c.clanId >= 0 && Server.clanChat.clans[c.clanId].owner.equalsIgnoreCase(c.pla yerName) && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 5000) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:42: error: package Server does not exist Server.clanChat.messageToClan("" + c.playerName + " rolled a "+ Diceamount2 +" o n the amount dice.", c.clanId); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:51: error: package Server does not exist if(c.clanId >= 0 && Server.clanChat.clans[c.clanId].owner.equalsIgnoreCase(c.pla yerName) && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 5000) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:56: error: package Server does not exist Server.clanChat.messageToClan("" + c.playerName + " rolled a "+ Diceamount1 +" o n the amount dice.", c.clanId); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:65: error: package Server does not exist if(c.clanId >= 0 && Server.clanChat.clans[c.clanId].owner.equalsIgnoreCase(c.pla yerName) && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 5000) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:70: error: package Server does not exist Server.clanChat.messageToClan("" + c.playerName + " rolled a "+ DiceamountB +" o n the amount dice.", c.clanId); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:79: error: package Server does not exist if(c.clanId >= 0 && Server.clanChat.clans[c.clanId].owner.equalsIgnoreCase(c.pla yerName) && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 5000) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:84: error: package Server does not exist Server.clanChat.messageToClan("" + c.playerName + " rolled a "+ Diceamount3 +" o n the amount dice.", c.clanId); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 8 errors A folytatáshoz nyomjon meg egy billentyűt . . .

Okay, so i have followed this tutorial. And I have managed to make the private dicing work. But i get those errors when I add the code to itemClick2.java. Help?
